channel.title: Desktop on Brighton Kotlin
channel.description: Recent content in Desktop on Brighton Kotlin

item.title: Introducing Compose for Desktop by Sebastian Aigner
item.description: Some time ago, JetBrains published versions of Compose for Desktop â€“ a modern UI framework for Kotlin that makes building performant and beautiful user interfaces for Desktop applications easy and enjoyable. In this talk, We will learn a bit about the principles and technology behind Compose for Desktop, and see what it takes to get started with building UIs in pure Kotlin! Bio Seb is a Kotlin Developer Advocate at JetBrains
